job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: Leveraging financial information is what Puzzle is all about. We are an ambitious startup, well funded by a top tier VC with an experienced team who have built multiple successful companies and raised over $500M.We are solving a true pain point that every company has and keeps having as they grow.We are on a mission to hire the very best and are committed to creating a culture where everyone is respected and has access to equal opportunity. We know that new ideas can come from anywhere in the organization, and the next big idea could be yours!What Are We Doing?Starting a company has become easier, but growing a company is more complicated than ever. We are building a real-time, smarter financial infrastructure to put trustworthy data into the hands of decision-makers.We are currently remote, but will have a hub in San Francisco. But you can work from anywhere.Job DescriptionAs part of Puzzle you will help design and build our financial data system.We will be ingesting large amounts of data from disparate sources, transforming them, organizing them, and correlating them -- delivering the core platform for the rest of our products.Â Â We expect the data to be large, dirty, and difficult to wrangle.We want to be as real time as possible, event driven, and decoupled. Redundant, resistant and secure.Â And accuracy is key.This is your opportunity to be an early engineer at a well funded startup that has a successful founder and a drive to change how company's leverage their financials. We are remote first, so anywhere in North America works for us.What Youâll DoScale out our core ingestion platformCreate unique functionality for correlation of dataDesign interfaces and apis to our dataExtend and architect our event pipeline for speed and scaleExtend our core reporting platformWork on designing endpoints for our productHandle an ever growing stream of dataAnything else that comes along...What You Need To SucceedBS/MS in Computer Science, a related field, or equivalent work experience4+ years as a professional software engineerExperience developing large-scale, data intensive applications, ideally using technologies like Node, Python, PubSub, Kafka, Kinesis, ElasticSearchExperience maintaining highly available, fault-tolerant, and distributed services, including familiarity with technologies, microservices, managed services, GCP, DockerExperience with the design of and integration with APIs and web services such as REST APIs and GraphQLExperience with agile software development methodologiesExperience with financial systems is a big plusExperience with security is a big plusDesired SkillsPractical experience in developing applications using microservices, container technologies, container management systems such as Docker, Kubernetes etcStrong experience with Databases design (SQL, NoSQL) and analyticsPrior working experience in utility computing and/or cloud computing domain highly desiredExperience building and deploying applications and services into cloud environments (GCP highly desired)Puzzle is an equal opportunity and affirmative action employer.
